com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.bindings
Class BindingLocator

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.bindings.BindingLocator

public class BindingLocator
extends java.lang.Object

The BindingLocater performs the actual determination of what an interface is bound to in a given module and where in the source code that happens.

Author:
Darren Creutz (dcreutz@gmail.com)

Constructor Summary
BindingLocator(java.lang.String theClass, ModuleContextRepresentation moduleContext)
          Locate the bindings for the given class in the given context.
BindingLocator(java.lang.String theClass, java.lang.String annotatedWith, ModuleContextRepresentation moduleContext)
          Locate the bindings for the given class with the given annotations in the given context.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAnnotations()
          Return the annotations on the class we are finding bindings for.
 java.util.Set<CodeLocation> getCodeLocations()
          Return the code locations where the binding happens (and/or problems finding it).
 ModuleContextRepresentation getModuleContext()
          Return the module context we are running in.
 java.lang.String getTheClass()
          Return the class we are finding bindings for.
